title: The Secret
description: On the day I was married, I promised to love, honor, and obey my husband Stefan.Little did I know how literally I would mean obeying.Stefan tells me what to do, and I do it. There are questions asked, but I always submit in the end.It would hurt less if I hadn't started falling for him.It was supposed to be pretend. But the secrets we now share are too real, and they're crumbling every piece of who I thought I was.If only Stefan was the man I thought he was.If only I weren't so powerless.But there's one thing I have that he wants.My body.Â And I'll do anything it takes to right the wrongs I've discovered.
author: Stella Gray
